amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds for FEMA State and local grant programs (to increase eligibility for the Urban Areas Security Initiatives) by $58 million and to reduce the Science and Technology Research, Development, Acquistion, and Operations account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to to increase the State and Local Programs within the Federal Emergency Management Agency account by $58 million and reducing the Science and Technology Research, Development, Acquistion, and Operations account by $58 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Higgins amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 266 (Roll no. 356).
